author: andy_seaborne
msg: Only write out "# Base:" line if the base is not empty

author: chris-dollin
msg: Fixed .remove() bug [incomplete removal of triple information]. Added new
tests in AbstractTestGraph to cover these cases. Added new capability
iteratorRemoveAllowed() for Graphs that can't support .remove().
baseInfGraph now defines that capability false.
